DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two kind self-administered acupressure ( relaxation acupressure stimulate acupressure ) usual care management fatigue pain low back pain patient . Hypothesis : Self-administered relaxation acupressure result improvement fatigue sleep quality , pain , physical function compare stimulating acupressure usual care .
DOC.detailed_description: Acupressure Traditional Chinese Medicine ( TCM ) technique base philosophy similar acupuncture . It involve application physical pressure different acupuncture point ( acupoints ) . One advantage acupressure ability self-administer treatment . Acupressure also viable alternative acupuncture situation patient : ( 1 ) come clinic receive acupuncture treatment ; ( 2 ) frequent intervention need ; ( 3 ) needle phobia safety concern issue . The objective study evaluate validity feasibility teach acupressure intervention use acupressure educator management symptom relate low back pain . Specific aim : 1 . To examine effect 6-weeks relaxation acupressure ( RA ) compare regime stimulate acupressure ( SA ) wait-list control ( WL ) fatigue sleep quality assess Brief Fatigue Inventory wrist-worn accelerometry ( sleep efficiency ) . 2 . To explore effect 6-weeks RA compare regime SA WL chronic low back pain term reduce pain improved function .
DOC.criteria: Aged1865 year Nonspecific low back pain ( either selfreport via ICD9 cod 724.2 , 724.5 , 846.0846.9 ) Low back pain persist least 3 month Minimum 3/10 Pain Bothersome Scale Minimum 3/10 fatigue severity Ambulatory without assistive device Ability operate accelerometer ( ActiwatchS ) Stable medication regiment previous 2 month Report physician 's visit previous 24 month Englishspeaking Medically unstable ( acute condition acute presentation chronic condition ) Current pregnancy Radiculopathy report low back pain radiating knee Reported history spinal fracture , herniated lumbar disc , ankylose spondylitis , spinal stenosis . Report back surgery within precede 12 month Participation active litigation compensation claim Conditions might confound treatment effect interpretation result ( example , rheumatoid arthritis , lupus ) Acupuncture acupressure within precede 12 month Report sleep apnea 2nd 3rd shift worker nontraditional sleep schedule Use anticoagulant/platelet therapy within precede month
